title: Amazon API Gateway REST API with Private ALB integration via VPC link V2
description: This pattern demonstrates integrating an API Gateway REST API with a private Amazon Application Load Balancer using VPC link V2

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an API Gateway REST API endpoint that integrates with a private Application Load Balancer using VPC link V2
The private ALB routes traffic to an ECS Fargate cluster running containerized applications
The pattern creates all required security groups, IAM roles, and networking components for secure private integration
